scripts.start: nodemon --ignore docs --ignore node_modules --exec npm run dev-server
scripts.dev-server: npm run doc && cross-env NODE_ENV='stonks-dev' node server.js
scripts.unit-test: c8 mocha 'test/unit/*.test.js' --exit; rm -rf raw-coverage-unit && mv coverage raw-coverage-unit
scripts.integration-test: c8 cross-env NODE_ENV=test mocha --file test/integration/setupTest.js 'test/integration/*.test.js' --timeout 6000 --exit; rm -rf raw-coverage-integration && mv coverage raw-coverage-integration
scripts.coverage-integration: c8 report --temp-directory raw-coverage-integration/tmp --reporter=text --reporter=html --report-dir coverage-integration && c8 check-coverage --temp-directory raw-coverage-integration/tmp --lines 80 --functions 68 --branches 70
scripts.coverage-unit: c8 report --temp-directory raw-coverage-unit/tmp --reporter=text --reporter=html --report-dir coverage-unit && c8 check-coverage --temp-directory raw-coverage-unit/tmp --lines 76 --functions 68 --branches 70
scripts.coverage: concurrently -n unit,integration  "npm run coverage-unit" "npm run coverage-integration"
scripts.clean: rm -rf coverage raw-coverage-unit raw-coverage-integration coverage-unit coverage-integration
